member.name: M:KrakenApplicationProgrammingInterface.Controllers.PrivateUserDataController.GetAccountBalance
member.returns: array of asset names and balance amount

member.name: M:KrakenApplicationProgrammingInterface.Controllers.PrivateUserDataController.GetTradeBalance
member.returns: array of asset names and balance amount

member.name: M:KrakenApplicationProgrammingInterface.Controllers.PrivateUserDataController.GetOpenOrders
member.returns: array of order info in open array with txid as the key
member.remarks: https://www.kraken.com/features/api#get-open-orders Unless otherwise stated, costs, fees, prices, and volumes are in the asset pair's scale, not the currency's scale. For example, if the asset pair uses a lot size that has a scale of 8, the volume will use a scale of 8, even if the currency it represents only has a scale of 2. Similarly, if the asset pair's pricing scale is 5, the scale will remain as 5, even if the underlying currency has a scale of 8.

member.name: M:KrakenApplicationProgrammingInterface.Controllers.PrivateUserDataController.GetClosedOrders
member.remarks: https://api.kraken.com/0/private/ClosedOrders Times given by order tx ids are more accurate than unix timestamps. If an order tx id is given for the time, the order's open time is used

member.name: M:KrakenApplicationProgrammingInterface.Controllers.PrivateUserDataController.GetTradesHistory
member.remarks: https://www.kraken.com/features/api#get-trades-history Unless otherwise stated, costs, fees, prices, and volumes are in the asset pair's scale, not the currency's scale. Times given by trade tx ids are more accurate than unix timestamps.

member.name: M:KrakenApplicationProgrammingInterface.Controllers.PublicMarketDataController.GetServerTime
member.remarks: This is to aid in approximating the skew time between the server and client. https://www.kraken.com/features/api#get-server-time

member.name: M:KrakenApplicationProgrammingInterface.Controllers.PublicMarketDataController.GetTradableAssetPairs
member.returns: array of pair names and their info
member.remarks: If an asset pair is on a maker/taker fee schedule, the taker side is given in "fees" and maker side in "fees_maker". For pairs not on maker/taker, they will only be given in "fees". https://www.kraken.com/features/api#get-tradable-pairs

member.name: M:KrakenApplicationProgrammingInterface.Controllers.PublicMarketDataController.GetTickerInfo
member.returns: array of pair names and their ticker info

member.name: M:KrakenApplicationProgrammingInterface.Controllers.PublicMarketDataController.GetOpenHighLowCloseData
member.returns: array of pair name and OHLC data
member.remarks: the last entry in the OHLC array is for the current, not-yet-committed frame and will always be present, regardless of the value of "since". https://www.kraken.com/features/api#get-ohlc-data

member.name: M:KrakenApplicationProgrammingInterface.Startup.ConfigureServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: This method gets called by the runtime. Use this method to add services to the container.

member.name: M:KrakenApplicationProgrammingInterface.Startup.Configure(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment)
member.summary: This method gets called by the runtime. Use this method to configure the HTTP request pipeline.
